Articles.Content:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hey Guys...

Is there any possible way for one of you Amazing and .... Modders out there to retexture-ize the part's from Spanners Boomsticks Parts to make them look a bit more like the Original BDArmory Pack 4 Me???. <3

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Le Link~

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94830-PART-Spanners-Boomsticks-Parts-to-complement-BD-Armory

It would be best to post this in the respective thread, which I see you have done. No need for a separate thread.

The textures are accessible as .tga's in the mod download, though that would be difficult to work from directly.
